Brainiac is a simple education program that promotes to read and comprehend designed for senior high school students. The \"Braniac\" app builds skills in passage comprehension,word pronounciation and answering multiple choice questions about the text. When using \"Braniac\" learners will first read the passage.The learners must hold the information in order to answer the multiple choice test. The stories and poems were crafted by the real books from the senior high school teachers to encourage students to read more. This app is fit for students who: -When reading or listening information seems to \'go in one ear and out the other. -Have trouble responding to questions about the passage unless they can refer back to the passage.
